attributes.action: raise the Inheritance Tax threshold to £500,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the continuing escalation in house prices, the threshold at which 40% IHT should be paid should rise to £5000,000 this year ans incrementally by 10% approx. per annum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
